titles.title: A bill for the relief of Jose Buendia Balderas, Alicia Aranda De Buendia, and Ana Laura Buendia Aranda.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1129-1130)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/2/2011--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Jose Buendia Balderas, Alicia Aranda De Buendia, and Ana Laura Buendia Aranda.
